artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Kobayashi Tetsujirō; Carver: Noguchi Enkatsu
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
dimension: 14 1/2 × 10 in. (36.83 × 25.4 cm) (sheet, each, approx., vertical ōban diptych)
markings: Artist’s seal: 大蘇 {Taiso} | Carver’s seal: 彫工野口円活 {horikō Noguchi Enkatsu}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Sketches by Yoshitoshi (Yoshitoshi manga 芳年漫画)
title: Picture of Prince Moriyoshi, the Third Son of Emperor Daigo, Reciting the Lotus Sutra in the Dungeons of Kamakura
